div.p: This optional attribute attached to SCHOOL (within BIOGRAPHY EDUCATION ) registers whether or not the school attended was a religious school and tracks the changing historical significance of organized religion to women's educationement, relationships. It has a value of RELIGIOUSYES.

div.codeblock: CB was educated first at Rathmore Convent, Dunmurry, then at St Mary's Convent, Ascot.

div.p: Only use this attribute when the school is a religious school.
Question: If all I know is that she attended a convent school, how do I tag?
Answer: Place the SCHOOL tag on the word “convent” and use the attributes whose value you can deduce, including RELIGIOUS.
